welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pico Rivera! Get ready to experience the charm of our city, known for its vibrant community and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Pico Rivera has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Whiteman Airport is used for private and charter flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Whiteman Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights at Municipal Airport.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations at Municipal Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial flights and passenger services.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Compton Airport handles all cargo and freight operations, serving as a vital link for the transportation of goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Long Beach Municipal Airport is primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Torrance Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: The main international terminal at LAX, serving airlines such as Air France, British Airways, and Emirates.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest operating terminal at LAX, serving Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serving Delta Air Lines and select international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serving Delta Air Lines and select international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serving American Airlines and select international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serving American Airlines and select international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: Serving Alaska Airlines and select international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serving United Airlines and select international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serving United Airlines and select international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Monica Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cable Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Van Nuys Airport, serving commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Van Nuys Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ontario International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ontario International Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network after agreeing to the terms and conditions.
